  • Method Details

    • game

      public void game​(int[][] board, int sx, int sy) throws NumberFormatException, IOException
      Initializes and runs a simulation for a given user input.
      Parameters:
      sx - - size of x axis
      sy - - size of y axis
      board - - a board of size x by y
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - - this happens when user inputs something that cannot be interpreted as integer
      IOException - - throw this exception when then file path does not open for writing correctly

    • one_iteration

      protected void one_iteration​(int[][] board)
      Modifies the board for one iteration of the simulation.
      Parameters:
      board - - the target board

    • get_status

      protected int get_status​(int x, int y, int[][] board)
      Any live cell with fewer than two live neighbors dies, as if caused by underpopulation. Any live cell with two or three live neighbors lives on to the next generation. Any live cell with more than three live neighbors dies, as if by overpopulation. Any dead cell with exactY three live neighbors becomes a live cell, as if by reproduction.
      Parameters:
      x - - the target cell's x cordinate
      y - - the target cell's y cordinate
      board - - the target board
      Returns:
      the status of the target cell; 0 if it is dead, 1 if it is alive

    • atomic_copy

      protected int[][] atomic_copy​(int[][] board)
      Creates a copy of a board
      Parameters:
      board - - the target board to be copied
      Returns:
      a copy of the board
